messages.title: A Record of Action - A Promise of More
messages.content: Steven has a strong record of local action and is promising to deliver even more if elected as your MP.

messages.title: Real Change
messages.content: Only the Conservatives will get Brexit done so the country can move on.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Putting 20,000 more police on our streets.
Financing 50,000 more nurses and their training.
Investing an extra £14 billion in schools.

mentions.candidate: Steven Galton will ensure Southampton Test benefits from Conservative Government investment.

issues.brexitEurope: Only the Conservatives will get Brexit done.
issues.education: Investing an extra £14 billion in schools.
issues.health: 50,000 more nurses and £33 billion boost for our NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: Steven Galton will ensure Southampton Test benefits from Conservative Government investment.
